description:
The 5th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet that existed since at least 745 UC.
It fought at the Second Battle of Tiamat in 745 UC under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch77658 [Wallace Warwick], where it fought against the fleets of admirals Wilhelm von MÃ¼ckenberger and Keit. The battle resulted in a major Alliance victory.
It was later commanded by http://anidb.net/ch773 [Alexandre Bewcock] at the Third Battle of Tiamat, in 794 UC, surviving the battle intact. It covered the retreat of the surviving units of Willem Holland`s 11th Fleet after they withdrew from their main attack against the Imperial formation.
The 5th Fleet was also led by Vice Admiral Bewcock during the Alliance`s attempted invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] in 796 UC. The 5th Fleet initially fought against the Reuenthal Fleet during the Battle of Bilrost, managing to disengage and withdraw but sustaining 30% casualties. It later took part in the Battle of Amritsar, where it, along with the http://anidb.net/ch96406 [13th Fleet], was able to escape from the area (although at the cost of considerable casualties).
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Dai 5 Kantai
